....I have strong suspicions that this "DVD9" is the fake one that's been floating around forever (which is an old 700mb rip, horrible quality, that somebody bloated up).
This is just a bad dvd-release which have not been restored properly. A 700mb rip of a restored dvd will look much better than this 8 GiB release.
My rip of the restored, anamorphic print is up: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4198676/

Can someone else comment on the quality of this DVD 9 release pls. ? I don't wanna download it if the quality is crap. But if its the real deal id prefer it over a rip any day coz it ll have proper menus subtitles etc.
